doc.name: purchaseStateUpdate
doc.summary: Is sent as a result of the AppStore sending update messages on the state of purchase requests.

example.p: if thePurchaseId is thisProduct and theState is "completed" then

parameter.name: purchaseID
parameter.description: Is the identifier of the purchase request.

parameter.name: state
parameter.description: Specifies the status of the purchase update.

option.description: the purchase request has been created but not been sent. Additional properties such as the item quantity can be set in this state.
the purchase request is being sent to the store/market place.
the requested item has been paid for. The item should now be delivered to the user and confirmed via the mobilePurchaseConfirmDelivery command.
the purchase has been paid for and was delivered.
the purchase has been restored after a call to mobileRestorePurchase. The purchase should now be delivered to the user and confirmed via the mobilePurchaseConfirmDelivery command.
the purchase was cancelled bu the user before payment was received.
an error occurred during the payment request with more information available via the mobilePurchaseError function.

description.comments: The AppStore/Market Place sends a message that activates the purchaseStateUpdate message to notify your app of any changes in state to the purchase request. The messages continue until you notify the AppStore/Market Place that the purchase is complete.
